title: How to lose your conciousness - Quora

response.answer_text: How do you lose your consciousness? Consciousness is never “lost”. It only appears to leave when we voluntarily or involuntarily become unconscious. We enter another “process” within consciousness. Sleep is a process within consciousness. Anesthesia is a process within consciousness. During anesthesia, for example, consciousness is blocked in the brain by dampening quantum resonance within tubulin proteins of neuron microtubules (1). The quantum vibrations are not manufactured by the brain. They are the method by which consciousness interacts with the brain. Some patients report continuation of consciousness outside of the body during anesthesia. Consciousness returns to the body when the anesthesia gases dissipate. (1) Consciousness Depends on Tubulin Vibrations Inside Neurons, Anesthesia Study Suggests
